summary.title: Collective Intelligence–Wisdom Of Crowds Topic Community
summary.summary: This community comprises two topic entities—Collective Intelligence and Wisdom Of Crowds—that are directly connected by a single RELATED_TO relationship, with no additional entities or claims present.
summary.rating explanation: The community consists of only two topics linked by one relationship, indicating minimal complexity and impact.

findings.explanation: The community contains exactly two entities: the topic “Collective Intelligence” (ID 119) and the topic “Wisdom Of Crowds” (ID 120) [Data: Entities (119); Entities (120)].
Both records are classified under the same entity type (“Topic”), indicating they belong to a common conceptual category [Data: Entities (119); Entities (120)].
Each entity entry includes the numeric descriptor “37,” suggesting an identical supplemental attribute across both topics [Data: Entities (119); Entities (120)].

There is a single defined relationship between the topics: Collective Intelligence RELATED_TO Wisdom Of Crowds (Relationship ID 193), representing their conceptual linkage [Data: Relationships (193)].
No additional entities, relationships, or claims are provided beyond the two topic records and the one RELATED_TO link, reflecting a straightforward and minimally populated network structure.
